Docs.summary: Provides User Datagram Protocol (UDP) statistical data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Instances of this class are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPGlobalProperties.GetUdpIPv4Statistics%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPGlobalProperties.GetUdpIPv6Statistics%2A> methods to give applications access to UDP traffic information.
The information in this class correlates to the management information objects described in [https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt).

Docs.summary: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received.
Docs.value: An value that specifies the total number of datagrams that were delivered to UDP users.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The number returned by this property does not include datagrams that were received but not deliverable.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of port errors.
Docs.value: An value that specifies the total number of received UDP datagrams that were discarded because there was no listening application at the destination port.

remarks.format:
## Remarks To find the total number of datagrams that could not be delivered, add the values that were returned by this property and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.UdpStatistics.IncomingDatagramsWithErrors%2A> property.
